Description: MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS AND QUALIFICATIONS·        Bachelor’s Degree or higher in Engineering.·        Min 15 years relevant professional experience.·        Strong track record in the management of detailed engineering activities of Power/Process Plants.·        Experience in Engineering Procurement and Construction (EPC), Industrial Gases, Petrochemical projects, or Power and Oil & Gas·        Strong organizational, communication and facilitation skills.·        Good commercial awareness with ability to evaluate change.·        Field Engineering experience is an added advantage.SITE SPECIFIC ROLE REQUIREMENTS:·        Mobility for site mobilisation. ·        Coordination with CMEI contractor, Construction and Project controls.·        Handle site queries and take decisions independently. ·        Reach out for home office support where required to expedite site progress.Job Details
